attributes.action: Abolish the charge for having a photo renewed on the driving licence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it that a driver should be charged £20 because the DVLA decide that your photo has expired.

When the paper licence lasts until you are seventy, with no charge.

It seems stupid that the licence is valid for a good forty years however the picture runs out in ten years and you are no longer valid to drive and could be fined £1000 with your car taken away and crushed.

There should be an option to return to the paper licence or have the renewal done for free.
